articles.description: Jayson Tatum set the NBA record for points in a Game 7 with 51 as his Boston Celtics beat the Philadelphia 76ers 112-88 to advance to the Eastern Conference finals.
articles.content: BOSTON -- As Jayson Tatum connected on another 3-pointer midway through the third quarter Sunday -- en route to outscoring the Philadelphia 76ers in the period by himself -- he turned to a raucous Bo… [+5845 chars]

articles.title: Ja Morant suspended after video shows Grizzlies star with gun - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The Grizzlies have suspended Ja Morant from all team activities after a video showing the star guard holding a gun began circulating on social media Saturday night.
articles.content:
The Memphis Grizzlies have suspended Ja Morant from all team activities after a video showing the star guard holding a gun began circulating on social media Saturday night.
